text: The Gandzasar monastery (Armenian: Գանձասար) is an Armenian monastery in Nagorno-Karabakh, in the Mardakert region, near the village of Vank. Gandzasar means "treasure mountain" in Armenian.В. А. Шнирельман, «Войны памяти. Мифы, идентичность и политика в Закавказье», М., ИКЦ, «Академкнига», 2003. ==Notes== Category:Churches in Armenia Category:Armenian Apostolic Churches Category:13th-century buildings and structures
title: Gandzasar monastery
